main_definition: The word 'Eva' is not an idiom in English; however, it may refer to the name Eva or have alternative meanings derived from other languages.

meanings_and_examples.example: 'Her name was Eva. She is an intelligent and kind-hearted woman.'

'In Finnish, 'Eva' means happiness or good luck. For example: Kävelen keskustelulle ei vaariin huolestuttaa Evaa.' In German, 'Eva' is a variant of the name 'Ava,' but it can also mean a type of flatbread.
'The EVA (Environmental Valuation Associates) company specializes in environmental economics.'
